entry.title: Your heartbeat next to mine
entry.summary:
Author: BlackBat_of_El

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,295Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

Summary: It's by accident that Clark Kent finds out that Batman is no other than Bruce Wayne himself. It's clear that Bruce doesn't know who he is, but when Dick Grayson insists that Bruce and Clark should go out together, he can't resist the chance to be with the man he loves.

entry.title: You and Me, Underneath that Red/Yellow Sun
entry.summary:
Author: BlackNeko06

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,212Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 4

Summary: After the most recent fight with the Justice League, where Superman managed to be taken out at the beginning of the fight, again. Leaving the rest of the League (read: Batman) to defeat the latest villain on their own, again. Batman decides he has had enough. Something needs to be done about the League's reliable tank, which is not that reliable, as it seems everyone knows what Superman's biggest weakness is.What is worse? The Justice League have received word that a contingent of surviving militaristic Kryptonians, led by Zod, is slated to arrive on Earth in over a year's time. Intent on taking over Earth.The only one who could stand in their way? Is Superman. Who Batman believes is not ready, nor does the Earth-raised Kryptonian seem to have any plan, or training. Batman can fix that.

entry.title: The Baddams Family Adventures
entry.summary:
Author: petting_a_bumblebee

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,616Chapters: 19/23Kudos: 1,112

Summary: Flash halted as a shadowy tendril leaped from Batman’s cape and slithered toward the side table. The tendril snatched a pie knife while its identical twin took a plate from the near pile. They cut a hefty piece, which they delivered to Batman’s waiting hand. Batman took a long and audible sniff off the treat before the slice and the plate vanished into his shadows.“As Flash stated, it is tasty”, Batman said emphatically in the sudden silence of the meeting room. “The plate was not bad either. IKEA?”- Batboy-centric glimpses of the life of the most lovable monster family in Gotham.

entry.title: Of Strongmen and Grumpy Geniuses
entry.summary:
Author: jg3m

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,620Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 14

Summary: Sometimes, it takes encountering another hopeless superhero almost-couple to make you realize what's been staring you in the face the whole time.Alternatively, Bruce and Clark are blown into the Marvel Universe, and Steve and Tony have to work with them to get them home. And maybe they find a little bit of understanding and a lot of love along the way.TW: quite a lot of burly men in unrequited love with their hot coworkersThis is my very first fic ever, wish me luck.

entry.title: Like Cats and Dogs
entry.summary:
Author: bajuwa

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,069Chapters: 29/32Kudos: 1,896

Summary: In a world where soulmates are represented by animal familiars, Clark wonders if his soulmate is a cat. A literal domesticated feline animal that one could get from the pet store and not just a person with some cat-like personality traits. There’s no other explanation as to why his familiar acts like every single asshole cat meme to ever exist.On the off chance his soulmate is a real human being, well… He would never tell his mother this, she raised him too well, but sometimes Clark wishes his soulmate’s familiar was making him feel just as miserable.---Bruce peels his eyes away from the monitors to look down at the menace on his lap and barely contains a look of disgust. Big blue eyes stare up at him as he rests his chin on Bruce’s thigh, and as their eyes meet, the pathetic, whimpering little whines are replaced by excited huffs, the clickity clack of dancing paws on concrete, and the rhythmic thumping of his tail hitting the leg of the table.Why does it have to be so needy and cuddly all the time?(new chapters every Tuesday and Friday!)

entry.title: The Psychic in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: BweepBoop

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,596Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 132

Summary: Bruce has been Batman for a very long time and the wear and tear of the city’s innate tragedy is starting to get to him. Estranged from his kids, left by those he loved; only Alfred remains and even that bond is starting to fray.He has no idea how to fix any of this. Luckily, an eight year old psychic might be exactly what was needed to thaw his icy heart.OR:Shigeo might not be a Robin but hell if he wasn’t absolutely a Bat

entry.title: Tentacles of Love
entry.summary:
Author: LadyArkin

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,398Chapters: 4/10Kudos: 39

Summary: He wasn’t even offering much more than, “I need a favor, buddy.”Batman’s marriage proposal was sudden and…strategic.Once they’ve spent some time together, Batman talks Superman into marrying for a mission. A mission that Bruce declares to be entirely selfish which he needs for business purposes. This mission isn’t supposed to be impactful to either of their personal lives.It starts when Bruce releases pictures of Batman proposing to Superman. He didn’t need more than a distraction and if it hadn’t been for an intervention from their family and friends, it wouldn’t have been. The more involved their blended family gets into their relationship, the more that they are supported in their relationship.

entry.title: And They Were Just Best Friends
entry.summary:
Author: kitfornow

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,559Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 268

Summary: “Uh—before we begin,” Clark announces, “a bit of personal business. I am officially engaged!”“What!?” Barry asks excitedly.“Wow!” Diana exclaims. “Most congratulations!” Hal and Oliver clap and whoop, and Clark smiles in appreciation.“Ohmygosh,” Barry continues, “I was just saying the other day that you two would figure it out! Hal, you owe me twenty—”“—To Lois Lane," Bruce interrupts, still staring out the window.Bruce’s interruption has the entire table falling silent, faces genuinely falling, mouths snapping closed. Clark doesn’t really understand why anyone would need the clarification.-A 5+1(+1) Things crack fic that I couldn't stop thinking about.

entry.title: The Road Not Taken
entry.summary:
Author: mustangisinflames

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,062Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 42

Summary: "And this- this was what he remembered clearest. The boy looking at him with such intensity it may as well have been a glare. The redness scored about his eyes and cheeks, the almost angry press of his lips into a harsh straight line - defiant. Each and every detail of his face ingrained into Clark so deep it went beyond mere synapses and the cramped attic space of his brain. It was etched into his bones, carved into the core of him with the certainty of a cleaving blade.The boy’s face from all those years ago fit perfectly into Bruce Wayne’s now."-Whilst attending a gala, Daily Planet reporter Clark Kent remembers the day that a car broke down near the farm.

entry.summary:
